    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40d0158c-c548-44a2-2dcf-8b4a07fc4a01#1#4</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Pietro Lorenzetti: Levétel a keresztről</string>
            <string language="en">Pietro Lorenzetti: Removing from the cross</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pietro Lorenzetti: Löschen vom Kreuz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pietro Lorenzetti : Retirer de la croix</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pietro Lorenzetti: Remover da cruz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pietro Lorenzetti: Rimuovendo dalla 
traversa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Πηετρο Lorenzetti: Αφαίρεση από το σταυρό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pietro Lorenzetti: El quitar de la cruz</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Pietro Lorenzetti: Levétel a keresztről, 1320 k. Assisi, San Francesco, alsó templom, keresztház, freskó.</string>
            <string language="en">Pietro Lorenzetti: Removing from the cross, about 1320  Assisi, San Francesco, bottom church, cross house, fresco.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Lorenzetti,  Pietro,  Assisi,  Levétel a keresztről,  Siena,  Pietro Lorenzetti,  </string>
            <string language="en">Lorenzetti,  Pietro,  Assisi,  Removing from the cross,  Siena,  Pietro Lorenzetti, </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pietro Lorenzetti: Vom Kreuz löschen, 
ungefähr 1320 Assisi, San Francesco, untere Kirche, Kreuzhaus, 
Fresko.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pietro Lorenzetti : Retirant de la croix, 
environ 1320 Assisi, San Francesco, église inférieure, maison en 
travers, fresque.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pietro Lorenzetti: Removendo da cruz, 
aproximadamente 1320 Assisi, San Francesco, igreja inferior, casa 
transversal, fresco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pietro Lorenzetti: Rimuovendo dalla 
traversa, circa 1320 Assisi, San Francesco, chiesa inferiore, casa 
trasversale, fresco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Πηετρο Lorenzetti: Αφαιρώντας από το σταυρό,
περίπου 1320 Assisi, SAN Francesco, κατώτατη εκκλησία, 
διαγώνιο σπίτι, νωπογραφία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pietro Lorenzetti: Quitando de la cruz, 
cerca de 1320 Assisi, San Francesco, iglesia inferior, casa cruzada, 
fresco.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lorenzetti, Pietro, Assisi, löschend vom Kreuz, Siena, Pietro 
Lorenzetti,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lorenzetti, Pietro, Assisi, retirant de la croix, Siena, Pietro 
Lorenzetti,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lorenzetti, Pietro, Assisi, removendo da cruz, Siena, Pietro 
Lorenzetti,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lorenzetti, Pietro, Assisi, rimuovente dalla traversa, Siena, 
Pietro Lorenzetti,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Lorenzetti, Pietro, Assisi, που αφαιρεί από το 
σταυρό, Σιένα, Pietro Lorenzetti,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lorenzetti, Pietro, Assisi, quitando de la cruz, Siena, Pietro 
Lorenzetti,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

        </educational>
        <rights>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

        org:Sulinet

      </lom>
    </metadata>
